name: Microlite Design System by Axial
description:
This is a UI component library based on the in-house one we use at Axial, with over 70 components and dozens of styles.


You can read about the process used in creating this design system here.


Although it has many components for a CRM, network or marketplace, this toolkit can be used to design most web-based applications.


Current components:

  • Set of LineIcons
  • Three button types with multiple sizes; multiple states
  • Text input with multiple sizes/styles; multiple states
  • Dropdown with multiple sizes/styles; multiple states; components for dropdown menus
  • Rich text editor
  • Switch
  • Checkbox
  • Radio Button
  • User Avatar
  • 5-Star Rating System
  • Pill with 5 styles
  • Pagination
  • Chips with 3 styles
  • Date Picker with Calendar dropdown
  • Dashboard Card
  • Modal
  • Contact Card


We're always looking for ways to learn and improve so this will be updated periodically.


Find out more about Axial here


Updates


October 2021: Components have been updated to make use of the new interactive component feature.
